Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne kalikhung’asibwa akali mubilifu
Toto Nyasaye wabu Omulesi inyanga eyo aliba nende amakhuwa kabu boosi
Eshikhong’ondanga
Nishina shikhong’ondanga
Ne nishiina shilakhumanyia mbu nishina shikhong’ondanga
Inyanga	yabandu	baliba	shinga tsimburukuru tsisaalanibwe
Ne tsinguli tsiliba shinga ipamba isakhululwe
Kho ulia weshichelo shishie shiliba eshisiro
Oyo aliba mubulamu buchamisia
Ne ulia weshichelo shishie shiliba eshiangu
Oyo eshimenyo shishie shiliba mumulilo kwa Hawiya
Ne nishina shikhumanyisia mbu nishina esho
Ni omulilo omukhongo
Okhukonya ebinji khubakoyaniyie
Okhula mulile mutsing’ani
Shikali kario tawe! Mulitsa okhumanya
Mana khandi shikali kario tawe! Mulitsa okhumanya
Shikali kario tawe! Mumanyangakhwo amachesi katoto
Toto bwene mulilola Jahannam
Mana khandi toto bwene muliyilola nende imoni yatoto
Mana khandi toto mulirebwa inyanga eyo okhulondokhana nende obwokholo
